mapper.select: WITH WAREAREALIST AS ( SELECT WAREHOUSE_CD, COUNT(*) WACOUNT FROM WAREAREA GROUP BY WAREHOUSE_CD ) SELECT WH.WAREHOUSE_CD, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM, CC.COMMON_NM WAREHOUSE_TP, WH.WAREHOUSE_IN, WH.WAREHOUSE_RM, WH.WAREHOUSE_US, NVL(WA.WACOUNT, 0) WACOUNT FROM WAREHOUSE WH LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC ='WHTYPE' AND CC.COMMON_CC = WH.WAREHOUSE_TP LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREAREALIST WA ON WA.WAREHOUSE_CD = WH.WAREHOUSE_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND WH.WAREHOUSE_CD LIKE '%${filter.warehouse_cd}%' AND WH.WAREHOUSE_NM LIKE '%${filter.warehouse_nm}%' AND WH.WAREHOUSE_TP = #{filter.warehouse_tp} AND WH.WAREHOUSE_US = #{filter.warehouse_us} ORDER BY WH.WAREHOUSE_IN

SELECT PR.PRODUCT_CD, PR.PRODUCT_GC, CC2.COMMON_NM PRODUCT_GN, PR.PRODUCT_CC, CC3.COMMON_NM PRODUCT_CN, PR.PRODUCT_NM, CASE WHEN PR.PRODUCT_GC IN ('MATERIALS', 'SUBMAT') THEN NULL ELSE LISTAGG(DISTINCT PR.PRODUCT_SZ, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PR.PRODUCT_SZ) END AS PRODUCT_SZ, CASE WHEN PR.PRODUCT_GC IN ('MATERIALS', 'SUBMAT') THEN NULL ELSE LISTAGG(DISTINCT PR.PRODUCT_CR, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PRODUCT_CR) END AS PRODUCT_CR, CASE WHEN PR.PRODUCT_GC IN ('MATERIALS', 'SUBMAT') THEN NULL ELSE LISTAGG(DISTINCT CC.COMMON_NM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY CC.COMMON_NM) END AS PRODUCT_CRNM, PR.PRODUCT_GD, PR.PRODUCT_UN, PR.PRODUCT_WH, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM, PR.PRODUCT_PR, PR.PRODUCT_PC, PR.PRODUCT_RM, PR.PRODUCT_US FROM PRODUCT PR LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'COLOR' AND PR.PRODUCT_CR = CC.COMMON_CC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = 'PRDTYPE' AND PR.PRODUCT_GC = CC2.COMMON_CC LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC3 ON CC3.COMMON_GC = PR.PRODUCT_GC AND PR.PRODUCT_CC = CC3.COMMON_CC LEFT OUTER JOIN WAREHOUSE WH ON WH.WAREHOUSE_CD = PR.PRODUCT_WH WHERE 1 = 1 AND PR.PRODUCT_CD LIKE '%${filter.product_cd}%' AND PR.PRODUCT_NM LIKE '%${filter.product_nm}%' AND PR.PRODUCT_GC = #{filter.product_gc} AND PR.PRODUCT_CC = #{filter.product_cc} AND PR.PRODUCT_WH = #{filter.product_wh} AND PR.PRODUCT_US = #{filter.product_us} GROUP BY PR.PRODUCT_CD, PR.PRODUCT_GC, CC2.COMMON_NM, PR.PRODUCT_CC, CC3.COMMON_NM, PR.PRODUCT_NM, PR.PRODUCT_GD, PR.PRODUCT_UN, PR.PRODUCT_WH, WH.WAREHOUSE_NM, PR.PRODUCT_PR, PR.PRODUCT_PC, PR.PRODUCT_RM, PR.PRODUCT_US ORDER BY PR.PRODUCT_NM
SELECT * FROM MATERIAL MR WHERE 1 = 1 AND MR.MATERIAL_GC = #{filter.product_gc}
SELECT WAREHOUSE_CD, WAREHOUSE_NM FROM WAREHOUSE WHERE WAREHOUSE_US = 1
SELECT PR.PRODUCT_CD, PR.PRODUCT_PC FROM PRODUCT PR WHERE PR.PRODUCT_CD = #{product_cd} GROUP BY PR.PRODUCT_CD, PR.PRODUCT_PC
